name: WKAlertAction
desc: An object that encapsulates information about a button displayed in an alert or action sheet.

items.name: init(title: String, style: WKAlertActionStyle, handler: WKAlertActionHandler)
items.desc: Creates and returns an action object with the specified button information.

items.name: enum WKAlertActionStyle
items.desc: Constants indicating the style of the action button.

items.name: typealias WKAlertActionHandler
items.desc: A block to perform in response to an action.
